pkgmetadata.longdescription: Identification of Periodically Expressed Genes // The GeneCycle package implements the approaches of Wichert et al. (2004) doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btg364, Ahdesmaki et al. (2005) DOI:10.1186/1471-2105-6-117 and Ahdesmaki et al. (2007) DOI:10.1186/1471-2105-8-233 for detecting periodically expressed genes from gene expression time series data.
